name: RPG Asset Tile Set 'Dungeon' SMS
description:
Dungeon Tile Set for your game adventure.

Can be used as tiles in 8x8 or 16x16 tiles.

Base for dungeons included, and objects are individually available, such as: Doors, Table and the Torture Rack.

Torture Rack has sprites for 'turning' handle as well as 'Hostage' character.

Enjoy! :)
